survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Indoor Vertical Farming Kits
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have purchased and used indoor vertical farming kits to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor vertical farming kit overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor vertical farming kit overall?

questions.question_text: Which features of the indoor vertical farming kit do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify the most valued features. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which features of the indoor vertical farming kit do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the indoor vertical farming kit?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback on challenges. Encourage respondents to be specific.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the indoor vertical farming kit?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this indoor vertical farming kit to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This is a key metric for customer loyalty.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future versions of the indoor vertical farming kit?
